name: Crunchy Seafood Red Salad
description: This Crunchy Seafood Red Salad blends the delicious flavors of the ocean with the freshness of raw vegetables and fruits, making it a perfect dish for those seeking high-protein, high-fiber, and health-conscious recipes. Dive into a bowl of goodness that brings together the best of both worlds.
recipeIngredient: 0.50  fruit 2-1/4" high x 2-1/2" dia, Pears, asian, raw
3  sticks (86 g), Ichiban Alaskan Crab Flavored

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the red cabbage, and drain the young corn.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the Asian pear and apple into thin slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Open the can of tuna and drain the water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the Alaskan crab flavored sticks into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, gently mix the chopped cabbage, drained young corn, sliced pear and apple, drained tuna, and chopped crab sticks until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Chill in the refrigerator for about 15 minutes before serving to let the flavors blend.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
